itemInfo.itemDesc: A material used for Crafting equipment. It can be obtained through Excavation.

item.name: Seleth Longsword
item.desc: A longsword possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Longbow
item.desc: A longbow possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Amulet
item.desc: An amulet possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Axe
item.desc: An axe possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Ultimate Seleth Staff
item.desc:
A Seleth staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Seleth staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff of Destruction, Seleth Staff of Temptation, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Temptation, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Destruction, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Seleth Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Staff of Crimson Flame, Seleth Staff

item.name: Seleth Shortsword
item.desc: A Shortsword possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Ultimate Seleth Shortsword
item.desc:
A Seleth Shortsword developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Seleth Shortsword.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Shortsword of Crimson Flame, Seleth Shortsword of Destruction, Seleth Shortsword of Temptation, Seleth Shortsword
